item.title: Stumbling with RStan
item.description: So I was listing to one of my favorite podcasts (DataFramed) a few months ago and a particularly interest guest was on talking. The guest was Michael Betancourt. Reading about the REALLY cool HMC HMC is the shorthand for Hamiltonian Monte Carlo. Trouble Getting Started The Getting Started page (‘https://github.com/stan-dev/rstan/wiki/RStan-Getting-Started’) is extremely thorough and gives some excellent pointerr. The page boils down to using the following R commands to get started
